About me

Hi there 👋 My name is Rui Tao(陶瑞). I'm currently a junior undergraduate student in SJTU, majoring in computer science in IEEE class. I'm honored to be an intern-researcher in ReThinkLab, advised by Prof. Junchi Yan and Dr. Liangliang Shi. My research interests include machine learning, combinatorial optimization. I'm currently focusing on Optimal Transportation(OT) variants and applications.

Code

Project

▣ Exploration in SLU:
We explored several improvements in Chinese Semantic-Slot-Filling task from data and model perspectives.

▣ Noodle Scholar:
Neat scholar search engine for 2,000,000+ selected papers on Arxiv. Support table parsing, picture extraction, LLM summary, Latex render and statistical analysis.

▣ Infection Model:
Parameter-free agent-based modeling for infectious propagation. We simulated a school-building environment to study the spread of infectious viruses under different behaviors of the crowd.

▣ Snake Adventure:
An advanced greedy-snake developed by Qt. Compared to traditional greedy-snake, it has added large amount of objects and adventure plots. Complex maps and missions have been designed based on the plot.
